title: The Girl on the Coca-Cola Tray
description: In this funny novel Jenny Sue Massengill tries to be the girl on the Coca-Cola tray. She defies her mother and marries Hyman "Feen" Feinstein. Happy at first she begins to find people are not what they seemed. Jenny discovers here family's awful secret and realizes the folly of trying to be a good girl in the Fifties. The novel will spark an old thrill of recognition in all readers.
author: Nancy Winters
